mcode Reference Model Version 1.0.0
shr.core

Entry Element Coverage

Documentation:

Health insurance coverage available (even if not used for payment for a given encounter).

Ancestors:
  • Resource
    • DomainResource
      • Coverage
Used By:
  • Insurance

    • Field Summary

      Coverage category such as medical or accident.

      InsurerNetwork

      The insurer-specific identifier for the insurer-defined network of providers to which the beneficiary may seek treatment which will be covered at the 'in-network' rate, otherwise 'out of network' terms and conditions apply.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      InsurerNetwork
      0..1
      CostToBeneficiary

      A suite of codes indicating the cost category and associated amount which have been detailed in the policy and may have been included on the health card. Alternate names include co-pay, deductible, exceptions.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      CostToBeneficiary
      0..*
      Subrogation

      Reimbursement to insurer. When 'subrogation=true' this insurance instance has been included not for adjudication but to provide insurers with the details to recover costs.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Subrogation
      0..1
